Name: Provincial Archives and Archives of Kincoppal, Rose Bay School

About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment; closed weekends, public holidays and Dec 15th - Jan 10th. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books, journals, microfilms, photographs, newspapers, maps and plans.

About.Access: Advance notice of visit and details of research, name, address and occupation required. Closed period of 30 years applies to most records.

About.Acquisition focus: All material generated by school bodies. All records generated by convents in Australia and some from overseas.

About.Major holdings: Society of Sacred Heart in Australia / Kincoppal - Rose Bay School: Magazines 1912-1991 (2m) School register 1882-1991 (1m) Articles and letters 1800-1991 Photographs (10m) Periodicals (5m) Original letters 1880- (2m)

Contact.Street address: New South Head Road, Rose Bay 2029
